m_szDocSumamry: News:Archive:2009:March Click here for most recent news. 2009 News:Archive:2009:April - moving forward in time March Biodiesel > from Algae > 'First Economical Process' For Making Biodiesel Fuel From Algae - One of the problems with current methods for producing biodiesel from algae oil is the processing cost.  Researchers from New York say their innovative process is at least 40 percent cheaper than that of others now being used. (Science Daily; March 31, 2009) U.S. Government and Energy / Fuel Efficiency > Obama to Automakers: Make Greener American Cars or Go Under - One of the reasons cited
